title: Collaborative Learning Between Clients and Architects: Narrative Inquiry-Based Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of architectural projects and foundational knowledge of instructional design
context.additional_context: Exploring learning effects applicable to educational settings by analyzing client-architect relationships for pre-service/in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners will explain three learning indicators (design/construction process, environmental adaptation, and architectural culture understanding) derived from successful client-architect relationship case studies.
Learners will structure project conflict resolution cases using narrative analysis techniques.
Learners will propose a learning model applicable to instructional design based on real-world cases collected in mobile environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
